GET /api.description: serves a JSON representation of all the available endpoints of this API

GET /api/levels/:level/questions.description: serves an array of questions for a given level

exampleResponse.title: What's a variable?
exampleResponse.background: In JavaScript, as a program runs, it needs to hold information in its memory. A variable is like a box, that allows us to store information. Every variable needs a name.
exampleResponse.example: To create a variable called 'dog', we write 'let dog'.
exampleResponse.question: How would you declare a variable called 'samurai'?

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object for a given username
